sentences: Antony Genn (born 1971 in Sheffield, England) is a British musician formerly in Pulp.
He also toured with Elastica in 1995â€“1996, playing keyboards.
He is known for co-writing with Joe Strummer and forming The Mescaleros in 1999.
Antony was also guitarist and M. D of the band until his departure in 2000.
He has been with The Hours since 2004.
